titleStmt.title: My Lord Marquis of Argyle his speech upon the scaffold, the 27 of May 1661 as it was spoken by himself, and written in short-hand by one that was present.
Speech upon the scaffold the 27th of May 1661
titleStmt.author: Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Marquis of, 1598-1661.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
